quote_first: Once he was back behind the wheel, he checked his watch:
quote_last: . No reason he shouldn’t make it to Shillingford in a couple of hours, although he knew his father would be pacing up and down the driveway long before then.
title: Best Kept Secret
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: In a little while his mind cleared, but his head ached, arms ached, body ached. The phosphorescent figures on his watch attracted his attention. He peered at them. The time was
title: Noble House
author: James Clavell
